data.title: Auburn Hills Michigan Verizon Store Locations
data.meta_description: Find all Auburn Hills Michigan Verizon retail store locations near you including store hours and contact information.
data.text:
Get up to $540 when you bring your own phone. Or get iPhone 15 on us. Online only. With new line on myPlan. No trade-in req'd. Buy | Details

Bring your own device: Receive up to $540 promo credit ($360 on postpaid Unlimited Plus or $540 on Unlimited Ultimate) when you add a new smartphone line with your own 4G/5G smartphone. Promo credit applied over 36 months; promo credits end if eligibility requirements are no longer met. Offer may not be combined with other offers. Limited time offer.

iPhone: $829.99 (128 GB only) device payment or full retail purchase w/ new smartphone line n Unlimited Ultimate, postpaid Unlimited Plus or Unlimited Welcome plan (min. $65/mo w/Auto Pay (+taxes/fees) for 36 mos) req'd.
